name: Project-LOOP
description:
A GAME MADE FOR THE LUDUM DARE 47 COMPO

Project-L.O.O.P is a game of strategy, skill, and practice. You were on the new L.O.O.P crew, a crew that would man the first time-travelling spaceship. Except - it went wrong.

You wake up on the ship. The rest of the crew dead, and the Time Warp Drive damaged. The Time Warp Drive will try and take you back in time every 60 seconds, unless you manually reset it. You have to repair the ship (by completing objectives), whilst making sure you never let the Time Warp Drive reach 0.

Good Luck!

Current Build:

Only has Phase 1, and Free-Play.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow keysMovementMOpen MapMouse PointerPoint and Click consolesEInteract
